definition: having or employing wavelengths longer than light but shorter than radio waves, the infrared region of the electromagnetic spectrum
details:
adjective
- having or employing wavelengths longer than light but shorter than radio waves
noun
- the infrared region of the electromagnetic spectrum
= synonyms: infrared frequency
- electromagnetic radiation with wavelengths longer than visible light but shorter than radio waves
= synonyms: infrared light, infrared radiation, infrared emission
